scripts.name: WME Ohio DOT Reports
scripts.description: Display OH transportation department reports in WME.

scripts.name: WME Quick HN (DaveAcincy fork)
scripts.description: Quick House Numbers

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Hazards
scripts.description: Find permanent hazards

scripts.name: WME Road History
scripts.description: Saves state of roads in area and it finds changes between history snapshots.

scripts.name: WME SC MapRaid Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a SC MapRaid area overlay.

scripts.name: Waze Edit Count Monitor
scripts.description: Displays your daily edit count in the WME toolbar.  Warns if you might be throttled. Extended with additional statistics including session time and map tracking.

scripts.name: WME GPS Track View
scripts.description: Draws and visualizes custom GPS tracks in Waze Map Editor

scripts.name: WME Bronx UR Project Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a group area overlay for the Bronx UR Project (2018).

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens
scripts.description: Scan a large area

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Cities
scripts.description: Find streets whose city doesn't match the boundaries of a polygon layer

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Locks
scripts.description: Find segments that don't match lock levels

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Map Comments
scripts.description: Find map comments that match filter criteria

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Places
scripts.description: Find place that match filter criteria

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Streets
scripts.description: Find streets that match filter criteria

scripts.name: WME Cities Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a city overlay for selected states

scripts.name: WME Military Bases Overlay
scripts.description: Adds an overlay for military bases

scripts.name: Waze LiveMap Options
scripts.description: Adds options to LiveMap to alter the Waze-suggested routes.

scripts.name: WME Simplify Place Geometry
scripts.description: Simplifies geometry of area places in WME

scripts.name: WME Client Tile Borders
scripts.description: Displays grid lines representing tile borders in the client.

scripts.name: WME Manhattan UR Project Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a group area overlay for the Manhattan UR Project (2018).

scripts.name: Waze Forum links
scripts.description: Add profile and beta links in Waze forum

scripts.name: WME WI GIS Map
scripts.description: Open a WI GIS map in another window, at the same location as the WME map.  Keeps the location of the GIS map synced to WME.

scripts.name: WME ClickSaver
scripts.description: Various UI changes to make editing faster and easier.

scripts.name: WME Route Speeds (MapOMatic fork)
scripts.description: Shows segment speeds in a route.

scripts.name: WME GIS Layers
scripts.description: Adds GIS layers in WME

scripts.name: WME FC Layer
scripts.description: Adds a Functional Class layer for states that publish ArcGIS FC data.

scripts.name: WME TN Parcel GIS Map
scripts.description: Open the TN Parcel GIS map in another window, at the same location as the WME map.  Keeps the location of the GIS map synced to WME.

scripts.name: WME Chat addon
scripts.description: removes duplicates messages, formats link and permalinks, and some stuffs

scripts.name: WME Advanced Closures
scripts.description: Recurrent and imported closures in the Waze Map Editor

scripts.name: WME State DOT Reports
scripts.description: Display state transportation department reports in WME.

scripts.name: WME Brooklyn UR Project Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a group area overlay for the Brooklyn UR Project (2018).

scripts.name: WME Texas PUR Raid Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a group area overlay for the Texas PUR Raid (2018).

scripts.name: WME Diffinator
scripts.description: Display differences between two segments

scripts.name: WME URComments-Enhanced
scripts.description: URComments-Enhanced (URC-E) allows Waze editors to handle WME update requests more quickly and efficiently. Also adds many UR filtering options, ability to change the markers, plus much, much, more!

scripts.name: WME Enhanced Search
scripts.description: Enhances the search box to parse WME PLs and URLs from other maps to move to the location & zoom

scripts.name: Zoom Shortcuts
scripts.description: Adds configurable shortcuts for all zoom levels

scripts.name: WME Mapraid Overlays
scripts.description: Mapraid overlays

scripts.name: WME Locksmith
scripts.description: Dynamic locking tool which locks based on State standards

scripts.name: WME WV MapRaid Overlay
scripts.description: Adds a WV MapRaid area overlay.

scripts.name: WME KYTC Lookup
scripts.description: Look up KY road info from KYTC.  Mouse over a road and hit 'ALT+k'.

scripts.name: WME US Government Boundaries
scripts.description: Adds a layer to display US (federal, state, and/or local) boundaries.

scripts.name: WME Place NavPoints
scripts.description: Add place entry point indicators to the map

scripts.name: WME Straighten Up!
scripts.description: Straighten selected WME segment(s) by aligning along straight line between two end points and removing geometry nodes.

scripts.name: WME HN NavPoints
scripts.description: Shows navigation points of all house numbers in WME

scripts.name: WME Reminders
scripts.description: Create reminders in the Waze Map Editor.

scripts.name: WME Virginia DOT Reports
scripts.description: Display VA transportation department reports in WME.

scripts.name: WME Rapid House Numbers
scripts.description: A House Number script with its controls in the House Number mini-editor.  It injects the next value in a sequence into each new HN. All house number formats are supported.

scripts.name: Restriction Manager
scripts.description: Save, and load, restrictions from local storage.

scripts.name: WME Color Speeds
scripts.description: Adds colors to road segments to show their speed

scripts.name: WME Split POI
scripts.description: Split POI with a new seg

scripts.name: WME Export Trajet
scripts.description: Export GPS point of your drives.

scripts.name: WME Wide-Angle Lens Hazards
scripts.description: Find permanent hazards

scripts.name: WME Road Shield Assistant
scripts.description: Adds shield information display to WME

scripts.name: WME Outreach Checker
scripts.description: Checks if a user has been contacted and listed in the outreach sheet.

scripts.name: UR Editor Profile Viewer
scripts.description: Changes the editor names in URs to a link direct to the editor profile.

scripts.name: WME Colored Map Comments
scripts.description: Change the color of Map Comment Points based on HEX Color Code.

scripts.name: WME LaneTools
scripts.description: Adds highlights and tools to WME to supplement the lanes feature

scripts.name: WME Suggest Permanent Hazards
scripts.description: Allow lower level map editors to add a map note for a permanent hazard.

scripts.name: WME Capture Viewport
scripts.description: Captures the viewport in WME and copies it to the clipboard.

scripts.name: Waze Discuss Profile Settings+
scripts.description: Add quality-of-life features to the profile settings page on Waze Discuss.

scripts.name: Waze Scan Closures
scripts.description: Passively scans for user-generated/reported road closures in WME and sends Discord/Slack notifications when new closures are reported.

scripts.name: WME Open GMaps Editor
scripts.description: Opens the Google Maps editor based on WME's map center.

scripts.name: WME Sidebar Wiki
scripts.description: Adds the wiki to the sidebar.

scripts.name: WME Search for Closure
scripts.description: Adds a search icon/button to find closures on a selected segment using Google Search.
